  2. Jamie Dimon issues rare CEO criticism of Trump's immigration policy: 'I don’t like what I’m seeing'  CNBC
  3. Dimon: US ‘less reliable’ as economic partner under Trump  The Hill
  4. Dimon Says He Would Be ‘More Polite’ in Criticizing Europe  Bloomberg.com
  5. Jamie Dimon rips Trump’s immigration crackdown: ‘Five grown men beating up a little old lady’  New York Post
